= Libraries =

In order to connect to VeSPA, you need to download the following libraries: 

  * Google Protocol Buffer <a href="http://code.google.com/p/protobuf/" target="_blank">Download</a>
  * XMLRPC <a href="http://xmlrpc-c.sourceforge.net/" target="_blank">XMLRP-c</a> and  <a href="https://github.com/timroes/aXMLRPC" target="_blank">aXMLRPC</a>
